wikipedia_page.main: John Bennie (30 November 1896 – after 1921) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a centre forward. In the 1921–22 season, he played 12 league games and scored six goals for Nelson in the Football League Third Division North.

response: * John Bennie (missionary) (1796–1869), Presbyterian missionary and Xhosa linguist
